translation.ko: 그렇게 끝나기 시작했어요 플린트는 먹지를 않았죠

translation.en: And three weeks after his mother died, he died too.
And he clearly died of grief. He just could not cope without his mother.
translation.ko: 너무 슬퍼서 죽은 거예요 엄마가 없다는 사실을 견딜 수 없었던 거죠

translation.en: When my detailed descriptions started circulating,
translation.ko: 내가 쓴 상세한 기록들이 퍼지기 시작하면서

translation.en: the scientists had to start thinking differently.
Scientists had to admit that we're not the only beings
translation.ko: 과학자들도 인정해야 했어요 개성과 성격, 감정을 가진 건 인간만이 아닙니다

translation.en: with personalities, minds, and emotions.
translation.ko: 개성과 성격, 감정을 가진 건 인간만이 아닙니다

translation.en: -Together we can! -[crowd] Together we can!
translation.ko: - 함께라면 할 수 있다! - 할 수 있다!

translation.en: -Together we will! -[crowd] Together we will!
So, if we could all just learn to love and to respect,
translation.ko: 우리 모두가 사랑하고 존중하는 법을 배운다면

translation.en: the world would be a very different place.
-[in Italian] Hi, my dear. Hi. -[Tadese] Vito! Vito, Vito, Vito, Vito!
translation.ko: 안녕 어서 오너라 비토! 너무 반가워요!

translation.en: This is so great. [laughs]
[Vito] It doesn't seem like eight years have passed.
Let's go. Come on, so we can head off…
It's the same feeling when you start a family and the kids grow up,
translation.ko: 가정을 꾸리고 자식을 키운 것과 똑같은 기분입니다

translation.en: and every now and then they ask you,
"How old is your child?" and you say, "My Gosh!"
translation.ko: 자식의 나이를 물으면 벌써 다 컸단 게 안 믿기잖아요

translation.en: One night, Tadese was on the phone, and he said
translation.ko: 어느 날 밤 타데세와 전화 통화를 하는데

translation.en: to the person he was talking to, handing me the phone,
"Let me hand you over to my father."
And that's when I realized that…
that we were…
something important.
[Vito] Every time someone asked me to go out to sea,
I would always find an excuse to decline.
Today, with Tadese, I managed to gather up the courage.
Now, the landings are nonstop.
People reach Lampedusa in huge numbers,
on rubber dinghies, boats, all sorts of vessels.
translation.ko: 고무보트나 작은 배 온갖 선박을 타고 오죠

translation.en: This is the spot where you were.
If you believe your life matters as much as anyone else's life…
translation.ko: 자기 목숨처럼 남의 목숨도 귀중하다고 생각한다면

translation.en: you cannot refuse to help.
[Pope Francis, in Spanish] There is a very beautiful alpine song.
"In the art of climbing, what matters is not to avoid falling
translation.ko: '산을 오를 때 중요한 건 추락을 피하는 게 아니라'

translation.en: but not to remain fallen."
There’s always someone to take your hand, isn’t there?
translation.ko: 언제나 누군가 손을 잡아 주지 않던가요?

translation.en: Looking at this another way
is the only rightful way of seeing a person in full.
translation.ko: 누군가를 온전히 알아보는 유일한 방법이기도 해요

translation.en: When you help them up.
It's not fair to look at someone any other way.
It's not human.
If you want to love, you cannot be indifferent.
You need to look more closely,
reaching the limits of human pain.
[Estela, in Spanish] For 36 years,
I was denied the opportunity to love my grandson and to be loved by him.
translation.ko: 손자를 사랑하고 사랑 받을 기회를 빼앗겼습니다

translation.en: And one day,
finally, after 36 years…
Hello!
…they called me on the phone
and told me that they had found my grandson!
It was the joy of…
of something very important for me and for my family
translation.ko: 나와 내 가족에겐 너무도 중요한 일이었어요

translation.en: because Laura came back with him.
Laura is still present in him.
And he can only imagine her
and dream of her.
[man, in Spanish] Holy Father, let's change the subject and talk about dreams.
translation.ko: 교황 성하, 주제를 바꿔 꿈에 대해 말씀해 주십시오

translation.en: A person who is not capable of dreaming
is missing something.
They are a sterile person.
And sterility is fine for operating rooms, but not for life.
translation.ko: 수술실에서야 무균 상태가 좋지만 평생 그렇게 살 순 없어요

translation.en: ♪ I can get everything everywhere ♪
